Package playwriter

Class Play

java.lang.Object
playwriter.Play
public final class Play extends Object
Represents a play.

  • Constructor Details

    • Play

      public Play(String outputFileName) throws IOException
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      outputFileName - Output file name.
      Throws:
      IOException - if file loading failed.

  • Method Details

    • getCharacters

      public List<Character> getCharacters()
      Gets the List of Character of the play.
      Returns:
      List of all Character.

    • newLine

      public void newLine() throws IOException
      Writes a new line.
      Throws:
      IOException - if writer is closed.

    • newPage

      public void newPage()
      Adds a new page.

    • setTitle

      public void setTitle(String newTitle) throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Sets the play title.
      Parameters:
      newTitle - New title.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if play title is already set or newTitle is empty.

    • setAuthor

      public void setAuthor(String newAuthor) throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Sets the play author.
      Parameters:
      newAuthor - New title.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if play author is already set or newAuthor is empty.

    • begin

      public void begin() throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Begins the play.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if play has ended, play has already begun, play has no title, no author or no characters defined.

    • addCharacter

      public void addCharacter(Pair pair) throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Adds a character to the play based on a data Pair.
      Parameters:
      pair - Data Pair, representing a Character's name and description.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if play already begun, character's name is empty, character's name is a special keyword, character's name is already taken, or character's description is empty but specified.

    • hasCharacters

      public boolean hasCharacters()
      Checks whether the play has characters.
      Returns:
      true if the play has characters, false otherwise.

    • modifyOption

      public void modifyOption(Pair pair, Set<String> modified) throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Modifies an option. This function adds the option name to modified.
      Parameters:
      pair - Data Pair
      modified - Set of modified options.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if value not given, option name empty, option already set, option value empty, or unknown option given.

    • setAct

      public void setAct(Pair pair) throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Sets the new act for the play based on a data Pair.
      Parameters:
      pair - Data Pair.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if not outside act, act number is now the successor of the previous or act description is empty but not null.

    • setScene

      public void setScene(Pair pair) throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Sets the new scene for the play based on a data Pair.
      Parameters:
      pair - Data Pair.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if outside scene, no characters talked, outside act, scene number empty, scene number is now the successor of the previous or scene description is empty but not null.

    • parseAction

      public void parseAction(LineParser lp, PlayAction function, PlayAction functionAll) throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Parses action.
      Parameters:
      lp - Line parser.
      function - Function to execute with some characters.
      functionAll - Function to execute with all characters.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if parsing failed.

    • curtain

      public void curtain() throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Ends an act.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if no characters talked during the last act.

    • findCharacter

      public Character findCharacter(String name) throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Finds a character with name equal to name.
      Parameters:
      name - Character's name.
      Returns:
      Character with corresponding name.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if character could not be found.

    • writeSpeech

      public void writeSpeech(CharacterView c, String text, boolean offStage, boolean writeCharName, boolean hasLeadingWhitespaces) throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Writes a speech.
      Parameters:
      c - Character to write the speech for.
      text - Text to write.
      offStage - Whether the character is offstage.
      writeCharName - Whether to write the character's name before to the text.
      hasLeadingWhitespaces - Whether to include leading whitespaces.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if c is on stage and offStage, or c is not on stage and !offStage, or incorrect use of hasLeadingWhitespaces.

    • writeStageDirections

      public void writeStageDirections(String text) throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Writes stage directions.
      Parameters:
      text - Text to write.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if tried to write them at an incorrect location.

    • end

      public void end() throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Ends the play.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if we could not properly end the play.

    • outputPlay

      public void outputPlay() throws PlayCompileTimeError
      Outputs the PDF file.
      Throws:
      PlayCompileTimeError - if play has not begun or ended.

    • closePdfWithFailMessage

      public void closePdfWithFailMessage()
      Closes the PDF with a fail message.

    • resetWidth

      public void resetWidth()
      Resets the width to 0.
